title.narrative: Scaling up use of Safe Delivery App (SDA) for provision of care for maternal and new-born health in Tanzania

description.narrative: The project is a scale up in the use of Safe Delivery App (SDA) in Tanzania. This project will complement Government of Tanzania’s efforts to improve skills and knowledge of health care workers in order to provide good quality of health care services to mothers and new-born babies. Ifakara Health Institute will coordinate with regional health directors in order to secure ownership at local level. The SDA is a job aid that provides necessary competences for a respectful, evidence-based Basic Emergency Maternal, Obstetric and Neonatal Care (BEMONC) for women in labour that adheres to WHO and national guidelines.
